      • createInMemModel

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model createInMemModel(Oracle oracle,
                                                               java.lang.String modelName)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns an in-memory Jena model based a given Oracle RDF Model.
        Parameters:
        oracle - the Oracle connection wrapper object. See Oracle for details.
        modelName - the name of the backend RDF model
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createInMemModel

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model createInMemModel(Oracle oracle,
                                                               java.lang.String modelName,
                                                               java.lang.String networkOwner,
                                                               java.lang.String networkName)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns an in-memory Jena model based a given Oracle RDF Model.
        Parameters:
        oracle - the Oracle connection wrapper object. See Oracle for details.
        modelName - the name of the backend RDF model
        networkOwner - the owner of the network tables/views. If null default MDSYS is used.
        networkName - the semantic network name
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createInMemOwlModel

        public static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel createInMemOwlModel(Oracle oracle,
                                                                    java.lang.String modelName)
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns an in-memory OWL model given an Oracle OWL Model. All triples in the specified Oracle OWL model will be read into the in-memory model.
        Parameters:
        oracle - the Oracle connection wrapper object
        modelName - the name of the backend OWL model
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createInMemOwlModel

        public static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel createInMemOwlModel(Oracle oracle,
                                                                    java.lang.String modelName,
                                                                    java.lang.String networkOwner,
                                                                    java.lang.String networkName)
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns an in-memory OWL model given an Oracle OWL Model. All triples in the specified Oracle OWL model will be read into the in-memory model.
        Parameters:
        oracle - the Oracle connection wrapper object
        modelName - the name of the backend OWL model
        networkOwner - the owner of the network tables/views. If null default MDSYS is used.
        networkName - the semantic network name
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • filter

        public static java.util.Iterator filter(java.util.Iterator it,
                                        java.util.Map mapping)
        Removes from the given iterator trivial assertions, including ClassXyz owl:disjointWith owl:Nothing, and maps those intermediate named classes back to the original anonymous classes.
        Parameters:
        it - source iterator
        mapping - a Map instance contains pairs of names (of those named classes created) and corresponding names of anonymous classes.

      • getMessageDigest

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigest()
                                                    throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Returns a new instance of MD5 MessageDigest.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • md5hash

        public static final java.lang.String md5hash(java.security.MessageDigest md,
                                             java.lang.String value)
        A utility function that returns a hex string of MD5 digest of value from a message digest of value.
        Parameters:
        md - an instance of MD5 MessageDigest
        value - the source string
        Returns:
        The MD5 digest in string format.
